demos.title: Alignment
demos.description: Demonstrates options regarding pane group alignment inside pane-area

demos.title: Theming
demos.description: Demonstrates how to customize ngx-panes appearance

demos.title: Resizing
demos.description: Demonstrates options regarding disabling pane resizing

demos.title: Lazy Loading
demos.description: An example of using ngxPaneContent to lazy load pane content.

demos.title: Configuring Defaults
demos.description: An example of providing default configuration for all child panes

demos.title: Github Browser
demos.description: A small application of ngx-panes for browsing a github repo content

guides.title: Theming
guides.description: Shows how to create a custom theme for ngx-panes and what properties can be set via a theme

guides.title: State Management
guides.description: Demonstrates pane area state management. What state is handled and why.
